texts.biography:
Beatrice was a talented follower of Erathian scouts - not yielding much to famous elven pathfinders. Talents of the girl had been noticed by Catherine herself and thence former scout became a general. 
However, her skills are still with her, she is one of the best at her cause.
texts.name: Beatrice
